about.summary: A semi hard Cornish cheese, also queries PyPI (PyPI client)

name: yarg
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "yarg" %}
{% set version = "0.1.9" %}
{% set md5 = "a17cb3e82fcd86e4184ec0f8c2e013c7" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  md5: {{ md5 }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python
    - requests

test:
  imports:
    - tests
    - yarg

about:
  home: https://yarg.readthedocs.org/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'A semi hard Cornish cheese, also queries PyPI (PyPI client)'
  dev_url: https://github.com/kura/yarg

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - proinsias
